mapper.select: SELECT PH_MAINWORK_TITLE , TO_CHAR(PH_MAINWORK_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PH_MAINWORK_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(PH_MAINWORK_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PH_MAINWORK_END_DATE FROM PH_MAINWORK WHERE PH_MAINWORK_CODE = #{ph_mainwork_code}

SELECT A4.U_NAME AS main_u_name FROM PH_MAINWORK A1, PH_MAINWORK_MEMBER A2, U_P_APPLY A3, U A4 WHERE A1.PH_MAINWORK_CODE = #{ph_mainwork_code} AND A1.PH_MAINWORK_CODE = A2.PH_MAINWORK_CODE AND A2.U_P_APPLY_CODE = A3.U_P_APPLY_CODE AND A3.USER_CODE = A4.USER_CODE

SELECT ( ROUND(NVL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PH_SUBWORK WHERE PH_MAINWORK_CODE =C1.PH_MAINWORK_CODE) / DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PH_SUBWORK_COMPLETE WHERE PH_SUBWORK_CODE IN ( SELECT PH_SUBWORK_CODE FROM PH_SUBWORK WHERE PH_MAINWORK_CODE =C1.PH_MAINWORK_CODE )) , 0, NULL ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PH_SUBWORK_COMPLETE WHERE PH_SUBWORK_CODE IN ( SELECT PH_SUBWORK_CODE FROM PH_SUBWORK WHERE PH_MAINWORK_CODE =C1.PH_MAINWORK_CODE ) )), 0)*100, 0) ) AS MAINWORK_PERCENT FROM PH_MAINWORK C1 WHERE PH_MAINWORK_CODE = #{ph_mainwork_code}

SELECT A3.U_NAME, A1.PH_SUBWORK_TITLE , TO_CHAR(A1.PH_SUBWORK_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PH_SUBWORK_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(A4.PH_SUBWORK_COMPLETE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PH_SUBWORK_COMPLETE_DATE , A1.PH_SUBWORK_DETAIL , A1.PH_SUBWORK_CODE AS SWLISTCODE FROM PH_SUBWORK A1, U_P_APPLY A2, U A3, PH_SUBWORK_COMPLETE A4 WHERE PH_MAINWORK_CODE = #{ph_mainwork_code} AND A1.U_P_APPLY_CODE = A2.U_P_APPLY_CODE AND A2.USER_CODE = A3.USER_CODE AND A1.PH_SUBWORK_CODE = A4.PH_SUBWORK_CODE

SELECT A6.U_NAME AS TC_U_NAME , A4.PH_S_COMMENT_CONTENT , A2.PH_SUBWORK_CODE AS SCSBCODE FROM PH_MAINWORK A1 FULL OUTER JOIN PH_SUBWORK A2 ON (A1.PH_MAINWORK_CODE = A2.PH_MAINWORK_CODE) FULL OUTER JOIN PH_SUBWORK_COMPLETE A3 ON (A2.PH_SUBWORK_CODE = A3.PH_SUBWORK_CODE) FULL OUTER JOIN PH_S_COMMENT A4 ON (A3.PH_SUBWORK_COMPLETE_CODE = A4.PH_SUBWORK_COMPLETE_CODE) FULL OUTER JOIN U_P_APPLY A5 ON (A4.U_P_APPLY_CODE = A5.U_P_APPLY_CODE) FULL OUTER JOIN U A6 ON (A5.USER_CODE = A6.USER_CODE) WHERE A1.PH_MAINWORK_CODE = #{ph_mainwork_code}
